author: Shinkai
description: Downloads a PDF from a URL, saves it to user-specified location, extracts its text content, saves the content as a text file, and returns the file paths and extracted text.
name: PDF Text Extractor

url.description: The URL of the PDF file to download

pdf_file_path.description: The local file path to the downloaded PDF file

text_content.description: The extracted text content from the PDF

txt_file_path.description: The local file path to the extracted text file
